TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tungawen, title = tungawen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tungawen} }

S.FORM: === tungawen === 刺竹 1. maliyuk nu tungawen ku umah ni Bunuk i Maibul. (Bunuk ). 2. u Lalimenah ku miladayay patayzaay i teban nu tungawen tu tademaw. (是 Lalimenah 把人帶到刺竹中間的). 3. liliden nu Salasalaw ku masabaay niza a tademaw patayza i tepad atu i teban nu tungawen. (Salasalaw ). 4. Lalimenah和Salasalaw是馬立雲部落的di'tu 5. di'tu nu Maibul izau ku Salasalaw, Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah. (馬立雲部落的鬼神有 Salasalaw,Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah).

=== tongawen === 刺竹 1. maliyok no tongawen ko omah ni Bonok i Maibol. (Bonok ). 2. o Lalimenah ko miladayay patayzaay i teban no tongawen to tademaw. (是 Lalimenah 把人帶到刺竹中間的). 3. liliden no Salasalaw ko masabaay niza a tademaw patayza i tepad ato i teban no tongawen. (Salasalaw ). 4. Lalimenah和Salasalaw是馬立雲部落的di'to 5. di'to no Maibol izao ko Salasalaw, Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah. (馬立雲部落的鬼神有 Salasalaw,Alikakay, Tadatadah, Lalimenah).
